forsen.name: Forsen
forsen.description: Track Forsen's Minecraft speedrun timer live, and set an alert for when he hits a certain time. Also view the history to see his lack of progress over time.

xqc.name: xQc
xqc.description: Track xQc's Minecraft speedrun timer live, and set an alert for when he hits a certain time. Also view the history to see his previous throws.
xqc.streamer_specific_html:
Only Twitch streams are tracked (expand for information on Kick).

I couldn't get Kick to work because it has stupid Cloudflare protection on its API. If anyone can figure out how to get Python to fetch from https://kick.com/api/v1/channels/xqc without Cloudflare getting in the way please let me know (@piggeywig2000 on everything).
